Related repos

  • infrastructure for running and managing GenAI agents with backend, frontend, and protocol support
  • GenAI agent tutorials and code for building and experimenting with different AI agent techniques
  • Framework for agents to use computers and code
  • tools for building gen ai agents that connect to databases
  • production-ready GenAI agent patterns and tutorials
  • Platform for prompt management and evaluation
  • framework for running, prompting, and managing MCP agents and workflows
  • Web interface for multi-agent LLM applications
  • Taskade MCP—server and codegen for building AI agent tools from OpenAPI APIs, connect agents to external platforms like Claude and Cursor
  • Infrastructure for AI agents in backends
